Subject: The Predacon Bunker

    Aracnia, Paralysis, Tarantulas, the three Maximal prisoners, and the rest 
of her group arrive at the alien site. At first examination they see its 
smack in the middle of the jungle, and then see a small round door in the 
ground.
    "What in the world is this? Paralysis, go in and look around." Aracnia 
said as she looked at the mysterious symbol on the door. 
    Paralysis did as he was told, undid the loid, and climed down a dark 
ladder. He reached the bottom to find a long corridor with doors on both 
sides. At the end of the hall way was a triangle shaped room. Scattered about 
where skeletons of someking of aliens with four arms.
    He entered the triangle room and realized that this must have been 
somekind of early alien settlement and observation station. It was big enough 
to serve there needs, and was deep underground.
    He climbed back up and reported to Aracnia.

    "Interesting. Alright, everyone, were moving in! Tarantulas and Paralysis 
will begin construction on autoguns and a sheild generator. The rest of you 
keep watch. When Quickstrike gets here we will begin a further exploration of 
the bunker." She commanded.
    With that the groups broke off and began there projects. The Maximal 
prisoners  were tied to a thick tree with energon bands. Soon they would be 
moved in and the Predacon Bunker would be operational.
